name: Jurassic Hunter 2016: World of Dinosaurs
description:
In the age of dinosaurs there is one king....the T-REX.

Go back in time and get ready for a Jurassic sized adventure. Go hunt the most dangerous dinosaurs that ever lived. Start your adventure by hunting the stegosaurus! Meet the challenge in over 15 action packed levels. Hunt all of your favorite dines:

- Tyrannosaurus Rex
- Triceratops
- Stegosaurus
- Brachiosaurus
- Spinosaurus
- and many more!

Start your hunt today and go on an epic adventure in a hunting game like never before!
